channel.title: Bursar Blog
channel.description: Insights for California HOA board members

item.title: Is Your California HOA Board Compliant? A Davis-Stirling Checklist
item.description: California's Davis-Stirling Act requires HOA boards to track dozens of compliance deadlines. Miss one and you could face personal liability. Use this checklist to ensure your board stays compliant.
